award_title: Collaborative Research: SHF: Medium: Foundations of Zero Knowledge Computation
subject: Making verification toolchains actually reusable
body:
Getting your verification tools and proof systems to run on someone else's machine is... optimistic. Too many dependencies, version issues, setup steps that never get fully documented.

Built Ouro as a thin API layer over computational workflows - researchers reuse methods directly instead of recreating from papers. Makes accessibility and real-world reuse easier to demonstrate.

Happy to show you if interested. (No rush - holidays aren't for thinking about reproducibility.)

Best,

Matt Moderwell
https://ouro.foundation
